name: Galaxy Wars (Sandch)
description:
Hello guys, this is my first game on Itch.io. I hope you have fun to play it. If you wanna see some other games that i created, check out my YouTube Channel with the following link: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3oS_YIXFioQQmV0EsPPosg

In the future i will try to make some bigger games, especially in the fantasy rpg genre. If u want to support me, like and subscribe to my YouTube channel.

Thanks!
